The Yunnan Longtantian Coal Mine is an open-pit coal mine located in the Beishe Village of Dongshan Town, Qujing City

operators: 曲靖市麒麟区龙源达有限公司 (Qujing Qilin District Longyuanda Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is currently under construction and is being expanded.
